structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Creation of fire protection or volunteer fire department district.
law.text: A fire protection district or a volunteer fire department district may be created in accordance with the procedures of KRS 65.182.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 195, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 67, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 77. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 47. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 25. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 1. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 3. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 1.
